A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Bad writing. Bad execution. This is nothing short of a complete disaster. Not to mention it took forever to not even tell a story. We are left knowing less of the characters we knew nothing about  and the story leaves off exactly where it began. 

This movie was a complete confirmation of my initial fears of Disney buying the franchise. They have no plan for it outside of killing it's previous owners work\, and it shows in the writing which seems to be made up as it goes. 

Rian has once again made another completely mediocre movie. If he's the new voice of star wars\, count me out.
